00008 #ifndef HASHITERATOR_H_
00009 #define HASHITERATOR_H_
00010 
00011 #include "Iterator.h"
00012 #include "Array.h"
00013 #include "Dictionary.h"
00014 
00015 SYLPH_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00016 SYLPH_PUBLIC
00017 
00018 template<class K,class V, class H>
00019 class HashMap;
00020 
00021 enum HashIteratorType {
00022     KEYS,
00023     VALUES,
00024     ENTRIES
00025 };
00026 
00027 template<class T, class Key, class Value>
00028 class HashIterator : public virtual Iterator<T> {
00029 public:
00030     explicit HashIterator(const HashMap<Key,Value> & _dict,
00031             HashIteratorType _type) : dict(_dict), type(_type),
00032             idx(_dict.buckets->length), count(dict.size) {}
00033     virtual ~DictionaryIterator() {}
00034 
00035     bool hasNext() const;
00036     const T & next() const;
00037     bool hasPrevious() const;
00038     const T & previous() const;
00039     std::size_t nextIndex() const;
00040     std::size_t previousIndex() const;
00041 private:
00042     Dictionary * dict;
00043     DictionaryIteratorType type;
00044     DictionaryEntry<Key,Value> * last = NULL;
00045     DictionaryEntry<Key,Value> * next = NULL;
00046     std::size_t idx;
00047     std::size_t count;
00048 
00049 };
00050 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE
00051 
00052 #endif  /* DICTIONARYITERATOR_H_ */
